channel.title: Sprint Meetings :: K-State CIS 642/643 Textbook
channel.description: Each sprint starts with a Sprint Planning Meeting, and ends with Sprint Review and Sprint Retrospective meetings. These three meetings Letâ€™s examine the purpose of each in more detail: Sprint Planning Meeting The sprint planning meeting includes both the development team and their customers. In this meeting, the tasks to work on for the sprint are decided upon, through a mutual negotiation process. Essentially, the customer shares what is most important to accomplish from their perspective, while the team advocates for what is necessary from their end.
